name: Danny The Demon
description: Help ! Danny the Demon aka Shadowmane needs your help! Simply, press anywhere on the screen, to create a long enough platform, to guide The Demon along. Gain a point for each platform landed. Endless-style, arcade-like, retro gameplay.Play at your own pace. Unlock new skins, music & art with high scores. Compete with others using the game center leaderboard & get all the game center achievements. Level play, coming soon! Thanks for supporting indie gaming !
